mapper.select:
SELECT t.shi_land_type shiTudi, t.shi_area shiArea, t.shi_name shiName, t.shi_house_number shiHouseNumber, t.shi_space shiSpace, t.shi_finish shiFinish, t.shi_construction shiConstruction, t.shi_start_price shiStartPrice, t.shi_price shiPrice, t.shi_guarantee_price shiGuaranteePrice, t.shi_is_elevactor shiIsElevactor, t.shi_add_price shiAddPrice, t.shi_auction_date shiAuctionDate, t.shi_bulid_date shiBulidDate, t.shi_location shiLocation, t.shi_url shiUrl, t.shi_lc shiLc, t.shi_code shiCode, t.shi_upload_date shiUploadDate, t.shi_end_date shiEndDate, t.shi_recall_date shiRecallDate, t.shi_sign shiSign, t.shi_appendix shiAppendix FROM ( SELECT shi_land_type, shi_area, shi_name, shi_house_number, shi_space, shi_finish, shi_construction, shi_start_price, shi_price, shi_guarantee_price, shi_is_elevactor, shi_add_price, shi_auction_date, shi_bulid_date, shi_location, shi_url, shi_lc, shi_code, shi_upload_date, shi_end_date, shi_recall_date, shi_sign, shi_appendix FROM show_house_info WHERE shi_sign = '3' ) t
and t.shi_area like CONCAT('%','${params.bo.searchMo}','%') or t.shi_name like CONCAT('%','${params.bo.searchMo}','%') or t.shi_house_number like CONCAT('%','${params.bo.searchMo}','%') or t.shi_space like CONCAT('%','${params.bo.searchMo}','%') or t.shi_finish like CONCAT('%','${params.bo.searchMo}','%') or t.shi_construction like CONCAT('%','${params.bo.searchMo}','%') or t.shi_start_price like CONCAT('%','${params.bo.searchMo}','%') or t.shi_price like CONCAT('%','${params.bo.searchMo}','%') or t.shi_guarantee_price like CONCAT('%','${params.bo.searchMo}','%') or t.shi_is_elevactor like CONCAT('%','${params.bo.searchMo}','%') or t.shi_add_price like CONCAT('%','${params.bo.searchMo}','%') or t.shi_bulid_date like CONCAT('%','${params.bo.searchMo}','%') or t.shi_location like CONCAT('%','${params.bo.searchMo}','%') or t.shi_lc like CONCAT('%','${params.bo.searchMo}','%') or t.shi_land_type like CONCAT('%','${params.bo.searchMo}','%') or t.shi_url like CONCAT('%','${params.bo.searchMo}','%') or t.shi_recall_date like CONCAT('%','${params.bo.searchMo}','%')
GROUP BY t.shi_url
shi_area like CONCAT('%','${params.bo.shiArea}','%') and
shi_finish like CONCAT('%','${params.bo.shiFinish}','%') and
shi_is_elevactor like CONCAT('%','${params.bo.shiIsElevactor}','%') and
shi_bulid_date >= ${params.bo.shiBulidDate} and
shi_space >= ${params.bo.shiSpace1} and
shi_space <=${params.bo.shiSpace2} and
shi_start_price >= ${params.bo.shiStartPrice1} and
shi_start_price <=${params.bo.shiStartPrice2} and
shi_recall_date = #{params.bo.nowTerminationDate}
order by (${params.bo.sort}+0) ${params.bo.order}
mapper.update: update show_house_info set shi_land_type=#{shiTudi}, shi_area=#{shiArea}, shi_name=#{shiName}, shi_house_number=#{shiHouseNumber}, shi_space=#{shiSpace}, shi_finish=#{shiFinish}, shi_construction=#{shiConstruction}, shi_start_price=#{shiStartPrice}, shi_price=#{shiPrice}, shi_guarantee_price=#{shiGuaranteePrice}, shi_is_elevactor=#{shiIsElevactor}, shi_add_price=#{shiAddPrice}, shi_auction_date=#{shiAuctionDate}, shi_bulid_date=#{shiBulidDate}, shi_location=#{shiLocation}, shi_url=#{shiUrl}, shi_lc=#{shiLc}, shi_appendix=#{shiAppendix}, shi_sign = '1', shi_end_date = null, shi_recall_date = null, shi_upload_date = NOW() where shi_code = #{shiCode}
